m :  finally  i ' ve got the chance to put on my new suit tonight .  i hope to make a good impression on your family .
w :  come on !  it ' s only a family reunion .  so jeans and t - shirts are just fine .

question: what does the woman mean ?
choice: the man has left a good impression on her family .
the man can dress casually for the occasion .
the man should buy himself a new suit .
answer: the man can dress casually for the occasion .
